Contains the x, y positional data, and the width, height size data.

\index{ostendo::Window (C++ class)}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:_CPPv2N7ostendo6WindowE}}%
\pysigstartmultiline
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:Pessumclassostendo_1_1Window}}\pysigline{\sphinxstrong{class }\sphinxbfcode{Window}}%
\pysigstopmultiline~\sphinxstyleemphasis{\#include \textless{}window.hpp\textgreater{}}
Core of everything output to the console. 

The {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:Pessumclassostendo_1_1Window}]{\sphinxcrossref{\DUrole{std,std-ref}{Window}}}} class is the base of everything that is output to the console. Everything output must be part of a window, and the windows controll all outputs, and output attributes.

\index{ostendo::Window::Print (C++ function)}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:_CPPv2N7ostendo6Window5PrintENSt6stringEz}}%
\pysigstartmultiline
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:Pessumclassostendo_1_1Window_1a1781807aea1eb5dedc9f2885e41fcd2b}}\pysiglinewithargsret{int \sphinxbfcode{Print}}{std::string \sphinxstyleemphasis{str}, ...}{}%
\pysigstopmultiline
Print output to window. 

Main output function for ostendo. str is a formated string such as for printf, with additional arguments as required. Accepts additional excape sequenced initialized with a `\#'. `\#o\_\_' will turn on specified attribute, while `\#f\_\_' will turn off the specified attribute. Attributes can be two digit numbers (0-7)(0-7), where the first number is the forground color, and the second number is the backround color. These attributes can also be any of the following: ac(alternate character set), bl(blink), bo(bold), di(dim), in(invisible), pr(protected), re(reverse), st(standout), un(underlined). \begin{description}
\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{Return}}] \leavevmode
-1 if window has not been initialized, otherwise 0. 

\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{Parameters}}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxcode{str}: Format string. 

\item {} 
\sphinxcode{...}: Additional arguments as required. 

\end{itemize}

\end{description}


\end{fulllineitems}
